subject: Doping (Sports)
Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: After a doctor was convicted for his role in doping cyclists, the Spanish judge ruled that blood bags gathered in 2006 from the doctor’s office could not be released to antidoping authorities.
snippet: After a doctor was convicted for his role in doping cyclists, the Spanish judge ruled that blood bags gathered in 2006 from the doctor’s office could not be released to antidoping authorities.
